programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: Christmas Class Reunion
programme.desc: Reuniting at Christmastime for their 15-year high school reunion, two former classmates challenge each other to remember who they were, who they are, and who they want to be.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: The 5-Year Christmas Party
programme.desc: Told over the course of five years, two recent college grads find themselves drawn together year after year while working for a catering company that specializes in holiday parties.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: Confessions of a Christmas Letter
programme.desc: After years of losing her community's Christmas letter competition, Settie Rose hires Juan, a struggling novelist, to depict her dysfunctional family in the best possible light.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Where Are You, Christmas?
programme.desc: Addy wishes for a year without Christmas and wakes up in a black-and-white world. She must work together with the town mechanic to restore the holiday to all its glory.

programme.title: Never Been Chris'd
programme.desc: Home for the holidays, BFFs Naomi and Liz reconnect with high school crush Chris Silver. A complex love triangle forms, forcing them to take stock of their lives and find the value of friendship.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Anna is hired to become a personal Christmas shopper for Marc. As they work together, Anna helps Marc learn that Christmas giving should be about the importance of the gift, and Anna discovers she might find success as an artist in an unexpected way.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: Confessions of a Christmas Letter
programme.desc: After years of losing her community's Christmas letter competition, Settie Rose hires Juan, a struggling novelist, to depict her dysfunctional family in the best possible light.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes transformed as she works toward granting a little girl's wish for a Christmas like she used to have with her mother.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: A Joyous Christmas
programme.desc: A successful motivational speaker learns the true meaning of Christmas when a stranger rescues her from a near-fatal accident.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: Sydney decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. When she meets Mac, he tries to make her Christmas wishes come true by helping her open herself up to life, love, and believing in the spirit of Christmas again.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments. As each ornament arrives, it brings a positive change to Marie's life, including an introduction to the handsome man from next door.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: When members of a family face loneliness and lose faith, Mrs. Miracle swoops in to renew their Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: A doctor encounters a man from her past who brings with him a revelation that could change her life forever.

programme.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Carly heads to a quaint town to lead the church choir during Christmastime. As she gets to know an Army veteran and the townspeople, she stumbles across clues that suggest she may have been brought there for a life-changing reason.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: Basketball Stories
programme.sub-title: 20 Years of Las Vegas Summer League
programme.desc: The rise of Summer League in Las Vegas is chronicled in a celebration of 20 years for the NBA's signature event, as superstars such as Stephen Curry, Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo would get their start in the Vegas Summer League.

programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Tulsa - East Carolina
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Bahrain - China
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Perth - South East Melbourne
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Czestochowa - Olsztyn
programme.desc: Pratimo mečeve najvišeg ranga odbojkaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj! Ova liga je svrstana među najbolje odbojkaške lige u Evropi, a u njoj se za svoje mesto bore najbolji klubovi te zemlje.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Cage Warriors 180: O2 London
programme.desc: Najbolji borci današnjice obračunavaju se u bespoštednim okršajima. Jedan loš ili jedan savršen trenutak mogu potpuno promeniti tok karijere.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Australia - Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Odbojka - Nemačka liga (Ž): Erfurt - Suhl
programme.desc: I muška i ženska odbojkaška reprezentacija Nemačke su uvek pri vrhu u Evropi. Njihova liga je jača iz sezone u sezonu, a njihov mentalitet obećava izuzetno interesantne mečeve.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Texas San Antonio - North Texas
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Košarka - Slovenačka liga (M): Helios - LTH Castings
programme.desc: Olimpija je favorit u Sloveniji, ali plasmani njihove reprezentacije pokazuju da imaju veoma široku bazu igrača. Možda budemo svedoci nekog iznenađenja?

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska 2. liga: Minyor - Pirin
programme.desc: Pratite Drugu bugarsku ligu u kojoj se takmiči šesnaest klubova. Reč je o drugom nivou fudbalskog takmičenja u bugarskom ligaškom sistemu.
